org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan
Interface Allocation

All Superinterfaces:
Annotatable, ClaimableHolder, Persistable, PlanElement, Publishable, ScheduleElement, java.io.Serializable, TimeSpan, UniqueObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
AllocationforCollections
All Known Implementing Classes:
AllocationImpl
public interface Allocation
extends PlanElement

Allocation Interface An Allocation is a type of PlanElement which represents the Asset that will complete the Task.

Method Detail

getAsset

Asset getAsset()
Returns an Asset that has certain capabilities. This Asset is assigned to complete the Task that is matched with the Allocation in the PlanElement.

Returns:
Asset - a physical entity or agent that is assigned to perform the Task.

isPotentialConflict

boolean isPotentialConflict()
Checks to see if there is a potential conflict with another allocation or asset transfer involving the same asset. Will return true if there is a potential conflict. Will return false if there is NOT a potential conflict.

Returns:
boolean

isAssetAvailabilityConflict

boolean isAssetAvailabilityConflict()
Checks to see if there is a potential conflict with the asset's available schedule. ( Asset.getRoleSchedule().getAvailableSchedule() ) Will return true if there is a potential conflict.

Returns:
boolean

isStale

boolean isStale()
Check to see if this allocation is Stale and needs to be revisited. Will return true if it is stale (needs to be revisted)

Returns:
boolean

setStale

void setStale(boolean stalestate)
Set the stale flag. Usualy used by Trigger actions.

Parameters:
stalestate -

getRole

Role getRole()
Return the Role that the Asset is performing while executing this PlanElement (Task).

Returns:
Role
